# Start-MCDWinPEMainWindow

Source: `source/Private/WinPE/UI/Start-MCDWinPEMainWindow.ps1`

## Synopsis

Shows the MCD WinPE main window.

## Description

Opens the provided WPF Window as a modal dialog. This function acts as a
small wrapper to make the UI entry point mockable during unit tests.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Window | Object | Yes | No | The WPF Window instance to display as a modal dialog. |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Start-MCDWinPEMainWindow -Window $window

Shows the provided WinPE window.
```
